alert.note: Alert for Sevier Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 3:44AM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Sevier Valley. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected and will impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes on all area routes including I-70.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
